languages.text: "Да, Вольный Торговец". {n}Арджента смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Я видела своими глазами, как один из членов вашей семьи явил свою истинную натуру служителя {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я уже пережила унизительное поражение от рук культистов, и боялась нового предательства. Я не могла заговорить с вами откровенно, и потому присматривалась, пыталась увидеть зерна скверны — или свет праведности".

traits.locale_text: "Да, Вольный Торговец". {n}Арджента смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Я видела своими глазами, как один из членов вашей семьи явил свою истинную натуру служителя {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я уже пережила унизительное поражение от рук культистов, и боялась нового предательства. Я не могла заговорить с вами откровенно, и потому присматривалась, пыталась увидеть зерна скверны — или свет праведности".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."
languages.original_text: "Да, Вольный Торговец". {n}Арджента смотрит вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Я видела своими глазами, как один из членов вашей семьи явил свою истинную натуру служителя {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Я уже пережила унизительное поражение от рук культистов, и боялась нового предательства. Я не могла заговорить с вами откровенно, и потому присматривалась, пыталась увидеть зерна скверны — или свет праведности".

I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists, and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “没错，行商浪人。”{n}阿洁塔凝视着你的眼睛。{/n}“我亲眼看到了你们家族的成员是如何展现了不为人知的真面目，成为了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆人。我已经在邪教徒手上遭受了一次侮辱性的失败。我没办法对你推心置腹，因为我害怕再次被背叛，所以我一直在观察你，寻找着腐化的迹象——或是正义的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: “没错，行商浪人。”{n}阿洁塔凝视着你的眼睛。{/n}“我亲眼看到了你们家族的成员是如何展现了不为人知的真面目，成为了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆人。我已经在邪教徒手上遭受了一次侮辱性的失败。我没办法对你推心置腹，因为我害怕再次被背叛，所以我一直在观察你，寻找着腐化的迹象——或是正义的光芒。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Así es, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Argenta te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Vi con mis propios ojos cómo alguien de su familia revelaba que estaba al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Habiendo sufrido ya una humillante derrota a manos de los sectarios, temía otra traición. No podía sincerarme con usted y estudié sus acciones, buscando en ellas la simiente de la corrupción... o la luz de la justicia».
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Argenta te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Vi con mis propios ojos cómo alguien de su familia revelaba que estaba al servicio del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Habiendo sufrido ya una humillante derrota a manos de los sectarios, temía otra traición. No podía sincerarme con usted y estudié sus acciones, buscando en ellas la simiente de la corrupción... o la luz de la justicia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「はい、自由開拓者」{n}アルジェンタはあなたの目を見る。{/n}「我はこの目で見ました。あなたの家族の一人が、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手下として本性を現したのを。我はすでに教団の手によって屈辱的な敗北を喫しており、新たな裏切りを恐れていました。我は御身を真っ直ぐに信じることができなかった。だから我は陛下を探り、腐敗の種…あるいは正義の光を探したのです」
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、自由開拓者」{n}アルジェンタはあなたの目を見る。{/n}「我はこの目で見ました。あなたの家族の一人が、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手下として本性を現したのを。我はすでに教団の手によって屈辱的な敗北を喫しており、新たな裏切りを恐れていました。我は御身を真っ直ぐに信じることができなかった。だから我は陛下を探り、腐敗の種…あるいは正義の光を探したのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Korrekt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Argenta sieht dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie ein Mitglied Eurer Familie sein wahres Gesicht als Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} gezeigt hat. Ich hatte bereits eine demütigende Niederlage durch die Kultisten erlitten und hatte Angst vor einem weiteren Verrat. Ich konnte nicht offen zu Euch sein, also habe ich euch beobachtet und nach Anzeichen von Korruption gesucht – oder dem Licht der Rechtschaffenheit."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: "Korrekt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Argenta sieht dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie ein Mitglied Eurer Familie sein wahres Gesicht als Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} gezeigt hat. Ich hatte bereits eine demütigende Niederlage durch die Kultisten erlitten und hatte Angst vor einem weiteren Verrat. Ich konnte nicht offen zu Euch sein, also habe ich euch beobachtet und nach Anzeichen von Korruption gesucht – oder dem Licht der Rechtschaffenheit."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est exact, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {n}répond Argenta en vous regardant dans les yeux.{/n} J'ai vu moi-même un membre de votre famille montrer son véritable visage de serviteur du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. Après ma défaite humiliante face aux cultistes, je craignais une nouvelle trahison, d'où ma méfiance à votre égard. J'ai donc pris le temps de vous étudier, à l'affût des germes de la corruption... ou de la lumière de la vertu. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, {n}répond Argenta en vous regardant dans les yeux.{/n} J'ai vu moi-même un membre de votre famille montrer son véritable visage de serviteur du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. Après ma défaite humiliante face aux cultistes, je craignais une nouvelle trahison, d'où ma méfiance à votre égard. J'ai donc pris le temps de vous étudier, à l'affût des germes de la corruption... ou de la lumière de la vertu. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın Hür Tacir." {n}Argenta, gözlerini senden ayırmıyor.{/n} "Ailenden birinin gerçek yüzünü gördüm, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} hizmetkârı olarak ihanetine kendi gözlerimle tanık oldum. Hâlihazırda tarikatçıların önünde rezil olmuştum, bir hıyanete daha kurban gitmeyi göze alamadım. Bu yüzden samimi davranmayıp seni gözledim. Yozlaşmanın izlerini mi yoksa erdemin ışığını mı göreceğimi göreyim istedim."
languages.original_text: "Yes, Rogue Trader." {n}Argenta looks you in the eye.{/n} "I saw with my own eyes how a member of your family showed his true colours as a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I had already suffered a humiliating defeat at the hands of cultists and was afraid of another betrayal. I couldn't be forthright with you, and so I studied you, looking for seeds of corruption — or the light of righteousness."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın Hür Tacir." {n}Argenta, doğrudan gözlerine bakıyor.{/n} "Ailene mensup birinin gerçek yüzünü gördüm, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın hizmetkârı olarak ihanetine kendi gözlerime tanık oldum. Hâlihazırda tarikatçıların önünde rezil olmuştum, bir hıyanete daha kurban gitmeyi göze alamadım. Bu yüzden sana samimi davranmayıp seni gözledim. Yozlaşmanın tohumlarını bekledim ya da erdemin ışığını görmek istedim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
